tasks.task: Driving a larger vehicle in a farm setting
subtasks: Sitting in the operator's seat and moving the steering wheel to control direction
Using the right foot to press the accelerator pedal to increase speed
Adjusting the speed with the right foot as needed for turning or straight driving
Verifying visibility on the right side by turning head to check blind spots while moving
Operating the right joystick to adjust the lift's positioning
Checking that the attachment is centered and properly secured before operation
Verifying the attachment's proper engagement with the lift mechanism
Using the right joystick to raise and lower the main arm of the vehicle
Positioning the arm accurately over the target area without overshooting
Fine-tuning the arm's movement using the joystick responses

tasks.task: Lifting and moving soil or materials
subtasks: Initiating the lift arm to raise the container or bucket
Guiding the vehicle to collect the soil or materials from the intended location
Positioning the collected materials over the desired location without spilling
Lowering the container slowly to release the soil or materials precisely
Confirming the material has been deposited accurately and repeat as necessary

tasks.task: Steering the vehicle on the way back
subtasks: Using the steering wheel to turn the vehicle towards the next location
Adjusting speed while turning to prevent tipping or loss of control
Ensuring proper traversal on the agricultural path
Manipulating the right joystick to initiate the retraction of the main arm
Checking the attachment's release mechanism and ensuring it departs properly
Confirms the reset position or cleanliness as needed after operation
